backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/vendor/lame.min.js: Minified lamejs MP3 encoder library used for client-side audio encoding.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders ChatScreen as the root application component.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatScreen.ts: Main chat workflow handling job creation, restricted-source checks, fetching, conversion, and scroll behavior.
frontend/src/features/chat/components/Ch: UI for entering URLs or uploading files, selecting format, and warning on restricted sources.
Renders a list of conversion jobs with status indicators, or a placeholder UI when no jobs exist.
frontend/src/features/conversion/convert: Loads lame.js and converts AudioBuffer data to WAV or MP3, handling encoding, validation, and progress updates.
frontend/src/features/conversion/fetchVi: Fetches a video file from a URL with validation, restricted-source checks, error handling, and filename extraction.
frontend/src/features/conversion/restric: Detects YouTube/TikTok URLs and provides user-friendly error or warning messages for restricted sources.
frontend/src/features/conversion/useConv: React Query mutation wrapper that runs video-to-audio conversion and returns the file URL and filename.
frontend/src/features/conversion/videoVa: Validates whether a Blob is a video by checking magic numbers or loading it into a temporary video element.
frontend/src/features/jobs/types.ts: Defines types for conversion jobs, including status, metadata, progress, and output fields.
frontend/src/features/jobs/useJobHistory: Manages an in-memory list of conversion jobs with functions to add and update entries.
frontend/src/features/validation/urlVali: Provides URL validation and normalization utilities ensuring proper HTTP/HTTPS formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
Updates a CSS variable with the real viewport height to improve mobile layout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatAutoScroll.ts: Provides a hook for detecting near-bottom scroll position and auto-scrolling a chat container when new content arrives.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend query methods are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, dark mode overrides, and layout defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/vendor-lame.d.ts: Declares TypeScript types for the lamejs MP3 encoder and its global window usage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, theme extensions, plugins, and dark mode classes.
